caption.title: CA16 infections increased permeability of monolayer HUVECs.
caption.p: a Permeability of monolayer HUVECs was detected by a paracellular FITC-dextran flux assay. Significant differences among these groups are indicated by * P < 0.05. b Detection of the expression of MMP9 induced by CA16 infection using ELISA and WB. c CA16 infections does not induced HUVECs apoptosis, including early apoptotic and late apoptotic
